page.title: 08THE SCHOOL
page.content: The school looks like a church and the front looks like a greenhouse.The staffroom looks quite modern on the inside but on the outside it looks old.There are 75 full time children and 10 part time nursery.Ther are four teachers 3 full time and 1 part time.On our Eisteddfod day at school Mr.Elfed Morris came to present the Gwernydd shield.That is Garth School now,but what about it's history.At one time Garth School boys & girls were not allowed to play on the same yard,and they had to line up seperately to march into the classroom.Written in a log book was that it had been established in January 1873 which was 112 years ago.In a nearby schools log book it said that a new school was opened in Garth on the 15th of March 1872 which was 113 years ago.
